title: The cloud is not a chemical plant
summary:
There is a lot of recent discussion about digital autonomy and Europe’s “position in the cloud”.
Here, I want to break down and refute a commonly made argument: that the lead of American cloud providers is so great that we can never catch up. In the recent and excellent policy initiative “Clouds on the Horizon” (by Dutch political parties GL-PvdA and NSC), we can read on page 23 why this can’t be a reason to just give up.
